name: Mute Before Shoot
description:
Created for Trijam #166 with the theme Upgrade your weapons

You find yourself surrounded by hostiles with escape so near and yet so far. You've got a gun, but will it be enough?

Planned to be a more expansive game, but 95% of content was cut in order to make time constraints. Development was streamed on https://www.twitch.tv/sofox

Made in 3 hours.

Made using Godot and Blender.

Controls:

WASD movement

Mouse move to look

Left Mouse button to shoot

Credit list:

Retro Magic FPS demo - https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/1036

https://freesound.org/people/twisterman/sounds/163584/

https://freesound.org/people/ShawnyBoy/sounds/165390/

Name by DaBigChill
